answers.answer: Yes call and ask ur doctor if it gets worse go to the hospital
Okay, another worry. Its reallly hard to see my phone. Like there are spots and blurs everywhere.

I am being watched closely for pre eclampsia and am 37 weeks. My advice is call your doc or go into labor and delivery.  Blood and spots in vision can be two of the signs. Another is swelling and high blood pressure.  It's not worth taking a risk.
Blurry, spotty vision is a bad sign for preeclampsia.   You need to go to the dr right away.
Im gonna go to the hospital for a check up. I have all the symptoms except high blood pressure and im not sure what my blood pressure is. Better safe than sorry. Thank you ladies.

question: Im almost 36 weeks and i woke up this morning with a small spot of blood on my sheets. There was nothing when i went to the restroom and i feel okay, but i would still like to know what is going on.
title: worries
